name: Financial Analysis
author: Huitzo Team
tagline: Personalized market insights delivered to your inbox
description: Get personalized financial market analysis delivered straight to your inbox. Configure your portfolio, set your investment constraints, and receive automated insights powered by real-time market data and AI-driven analysis.
features: Real-time market data integration via Polygon.io
Personalized portfolio analysis based on your holdings
Email delivery with interactive LLM-powered Q&A
Natural language reports you can actually understand

commands.name: finance setup
commands.description: Initialize plugin and configure API credentials

commands.name: finance configure
commands.description: Set up your portfolio holdings and constraints

commands.name: finance preferences
commands.description: Customize analysis parameters and report frequency

commands.name: finance status
commands.description: View current configuration and subscription status

commands.name: finance report
commands.description: Generate and deliver a market analysis report

commands.name: finance help
commands.description: Display detailed help for all commands
